imdb.plot outline: A powerful and gripping series looking at the history of sentencing for murder in New Zealand through the cases that shocked the nation. Over three compelling and thought-provoking episodes, The Trouble with Murder tells the story of how New Zealand has punished people who kill.
imdb.title: The Trouble with Murder
plot: A powerful and gripping series looking at the history of sentencing for murder in New Zealand through the cases that shocked the nation. Over three compelling and thought-provoking episodes, _The Trouble with Murder_ (qv) tells the story of how New Zealand has punished people who kill.
